item.title: Holmes Beach installs school speed zone cameras for the first time
item.description: Chief William Tokajer said the city implemented the speed cameras because people have been caught going well beyond the city’s max speed limit of 25 mph and the school speed zone of 15 mph.

item.title: Another warm, humid and stormy day in the forecast

item.description: The father of four spent two and a half weeks recovering in the hospital.

item.title: Emergency recordings and videos detail the chaotic rescue efforts during the deadly Texas floods
item.description: The flooding killed at least 136 people — including more than two dozen children and counselors at Camp Mystic.
